thig5.1:4.3: I have not found peace of mind,
thig5.1:4.4: even for as long as a finger-snap.
thig5.1:5.1: Failing to find peace of heart,
thig5.1:6.4: the aggregates, sense fields, and elements.
thig5.1:7.2: I retired to a discreet place.
thig5.1:8.1: I comprehend the minds of others;
thig5.1:8.4: and attained the ending of defilements.
thig5.1:8.5: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
